Name: Garnacha
Wine Description: Bright and juicy, it's crammed with blackberry, cherry and red fruit flavours all wrapped in lovely toasty spice.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: Rich, vibrant, and juicy, this wine boasts aromas of cherry and wild berry, with soft notes of black pepper. Tightly packed layers of cranberries, wild berries, and ripe cherries flow together with a touch of allspice for a rich, full flavor. Moderate tannins show in the rich, mouth filling finish.

Name: La Bruja Avería
Wine Description: North of Madrid, about two hours drive. Granitic soil, rocks in vineyards. Small, old bush vines. Horse and plow. All organic farming. Grenache. 100% whole bunch, all fermented in large wood. Often takes a year to ferment dry. Hands off winemaking. From two vineyard sites. Named for a 1980s Spanish children’s television programme. Has it all. High toned perfume with mulberry, cherry jam, rose hip and floral scents. Crispy crunchy texture, light on as all get out, fine though, with even concentration of pippy cherry-like fruit. Feel the rush of powdered rock tannin and relish the ‘mineral’ feel. Long, fine wine with juicy vibes and good guzzling appeal in youth, but with tannin working some mojo.93 Points MB Winefront ____ Deep red colour with pale purple rim. Jellybeans, strawberry drops and herbs. Fruity, tasty and very easy to drink.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: A lovely bright cherry red. Spicy cloves on the nose, with a wonderfully refined black cherry and plum fruitiness.

Name: Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas and flavors of high toned fruit, violets, vanilla, and nutmeg explode from the glass. A big texture and great structure keep the wine well balanced and smooth across the palate, with ripe tannins that carry the flavor on and on, through a long finish that lasts for over a minute.

Name: Los Nietos Mezcla Bordalesa
Wine Description: Intense hue of red. Its aromas are a complex mixture of berries and flowers, and slight hints of coffee and tobacco. It’s a wine with elegant tannins, and a good acidity level and persistence.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Intense red color. It presents notes of raspberry and gooseberry. It has a round flavor with good acidity level and persistency and it’s aged in French and American barrels.

Name: Bodyguard
Wine Description: The 2017 vintage presents fragrant fruit aromas of blackberry, raspberry, currant and crème de cassis. Notes of cocoa, coffee, dark chocolate, licorice and sweet cherry pipe tobacco are rounded out with whispers of truffle, toffee, mocha and menthol. A juicy, fleshy palate offers bright, generous flavors of cherry, cranberry, strawberry and blueberry tinged with black raspberry and tamarind—all supported by underlying accents of dusty leather, pencil shavings, cigar box and crushed herbs. An elegantly styled and beautifully structured finish reverberates with focused energy, vibrant berry fruit and ripe, polished tannins.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Ruby red in colour, garnet reflections of ageing. Its bouquet is intense with hints of violets, berries and cherries. Velvety, well rounded, full bodied and well balanced. on the palate.

Name: Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Wine Description: In the bouquet, this cool-climate charm takes the form of bright, fresh and flirtatious cherry and strawberry flavors. These fetching aromas are echoed on the palate, where complex layers of mulled cherries, strawberries and raspberries intermingle with spicy cinnamon and clove elements.

Name: Viña Alberdi Crianza
Wine Description: Medium-depth, cherry red, with a clean, bright pink rim. Intense aromas from the still glass. Swirling reveals jammy notes of wild red berries, raspberries, red currants and herbs against a balsamic background of vanilla, caramel and roasted coffee. Mild entry, with a medium. well-balanced body. Fresh and vibrant, with soft tannins and a harmonious, strawberry jam finish.

Name: Bourgogne Renommée Rouge
Wine Description: It has vibrant red fruit on the nose with aromas of raspberry and a hint of spice. Crushed cranberry and strawberry notes on the palate with some delicate spice from barrel ageing. A smooth textured wine with a long finish. Serious yet approachable, it is great with game or hard cheeses.

Name: Taurasi Radici
Wine Description: It is deep ruby red. Full, complex and intense, with notes of cherry, violet, wild berries and a distinctive spicy aroma. Fascinating and elegant in the mouth. With flavors of plum, black cherry, strawberry and intense spices.

Name: Toscana Dogajolo Rosso
Wine Description: Deep garnet with violet reflections. Bouquet is very fruity and intense, with hints of cherry, coffee, vanilla and spice. Flavour is full, soft on the palate, complex, well developed.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: Deep crimson. Ripe dark berries, turning to spices. Smooth and persistent with aromatic fullness.

Name: North Coast Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine has a rich palate of dark fruit flavours, with subtle hints of caramel and cocoa. It shows blackberry and black cherry flavours with structure and presence.

Name: Aria Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Ruby ​​red color with slight nuances nail grenades; It affects the nose a complex bouquet in which you hear hints of red fruits (mostly more) that the final well integrated with the spicy notes of wood.

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: On the nose, signature white pepper, ginger and plum flavours of Shiraz are combined with secondary hints of caramel and cigar box. Palate-filling mouth feel with a creamy, velvety finish.

Name: Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pinot Noir comes exclusively from old vines that were planted on the Chalone Vineyard estate in 1973. “These vines are grafted to the Macwood heritage clone, which produces a more Old World style of Pinot Noir,” says Winemaker Robert Cook. The wine is extremely complex, showing highly extracted red-fruit character wrapped around earthiness, minerality and a hint of white pepper.

Name: Pinot Noir Y3
Wine Description: It has modeled classically in the form of its Burgundy counterparts. Lower alcohol, pretty refinement and elegance are the framework that make this Pinot so special. Russian River brings to the picture nuances of bright cherry, strawberry patch, raspberry preserves, crushed spices and red roses. Bottled unfiltered and unfined, enjoy to 2022 and beyond.

Name: Talò Malvasia Nera
Wine Description: Thick ruby red intense and complex bouquet with notes of red fruits and spices. A full-bodied wine with a pleasantly smooth impact and a long ending.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A serious, fresh bouquet of ripe black raspberry, crushed flowers, candied violets and blood orange.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Primary aromas of fresh raspberry, plum and brambly spice are evident. The wine shows soft, velvety tannins and will develop complex forest-floor and earthy characters.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: The wine is purple. Large, nuanced aromas of plums, blackberries, bay leaf, tobacco and leather. Significantly strong tannins and good fruit acid. The wine is big and complex with a long aftertaste.

Name: Zamò Rosso
Wine Description: This wine is ruby red in colour. On the nose with bright red fruit, cherry, raspberry, violet that emanate from the chalice and thus make frankness and sincerity. On the palate this Zamò Red wine is direct, immediate and pleasant.

Name: Manolibera Maremma Toscana
Wine Description: Jaunty with all of the strong character of the maremma. The nose is strong with fresh luscious red fruit and pleasant strokes of aromatic herbs.In the mouth all of the freshness and vitality of this wine is confirmed. Precise, well designed, a very drinkable hit which is never dull.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: These communes provide terroir that produce a wine that may be attacked on release or laid down for a few years. The approach in winemaking, which has all the benefits of the modern equipment afforded by the more senior wines, is new world in style.

Name: Carneros Highway Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright medium light garnet color. Delicate, earthy, fruity toasty jammy aromas of spiced dark cherries, cranberries, sandalwood, and dried canvas with a lively, dry full body and a peppery, medium-length finish with leafy, earthy tannins and light oak.

Name: Termes
Wine Description: This wine is bright cherry red with a deep robe and violet glints. Fresh and fruity on the nose with aromas of blackberries, ripe strawberries and sour morello cherries. These aromas perfectly integrate with hints of white pepper and rosemary along with subtle notes of nutmeg and cinnamon. The mouthfeel is balanced and vibrant with a predominance of fruit flavors. A lively and intense attack is followed by an explosion of black cherry and fresh plums. The finish is long and persistent with notes of cacao and mocha.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine presents itself with forward fruit characters of black cherry, ripe plums, and blackberry. Savory nuances of cedar, anise, vanilla, and spice intensify the flavor and provide a balanced, satisfying finish.

Name: Nobile di Montepulciano
Wine Description: It has exotic array of smoke, incense, scorched earth, iron and black fruit. Ferrous, savory notes add complexity to the intense finish.

Name: Jean Marc Barthez Bordeaux Rouge
Wine Description: Neither glitzy nor flashy, but perfectly embodies the region’s rural soul. This wine possesses much of the dark-fruited complexity that made Bordeaux famous in the first place but rendered in a brighter, more refreshing frame.

Name: Shiraz - Cabernet
Wine Description: This blend has become an Australian classic. Dark Shiraz notes of berry fruit, plum and spice meld with the Cabernet's rich mulberry flavors and fine tannins. Attractive cedar and vanilla characters are derived from oak maturation, and contribute good complexity and great length of flavor.

Name: Beautiful Earth Red
Wine Description: Sweet fruit on the front end, blackberry, smoke, dark chocolate, leather, wet stone, mint, sweet tobacco, silky texture, elevated mouth feel with cured meat on the finish.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Strawberry and plum mingle with flowery notes. Well balanced with firm, sweet tannins. Intense wines express the primordial forces latent in their fertile land.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Full-bodied lushness and weight, a complexity of softly textured dark berry and cola that's lengthy on the finish.

Name: Garnacha
Wine Description: It exhibits greater aromatic complexity, richness with mineral and blueberry notes leading to a savory and spicy wine nicely balanced and very easy to drink.

Name: Aruma Malbec
Wine Description: Deep ruby color. To the nose, we find red fruits like ripe plums, cherries and raspberries as well as a soft spicy feeling. On the palate, it is fresh and juicy, a unique balance between acidity, gentle tannins and alcohol. Long and delicate finish.

Name: Luno
Wine Description: Notes of ripe dark fruits, blackberries and cherries lead to a balanced and supple wine that finishes smooth on the palate.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: It is bright scarlet in color and possesses aromas of rhubarb, licorice, graphite, and white pepper. On the palate, flavors of sweet plumb, cherries and vanilla meld with hints of tarragon. The wine is balanced with silky tannins, earthiness and a kick of spice.

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Intense dark cherry red; very clean and bright, with a lively ruby-red rim. The nose uncovers intense notes of wild berries and ripe fruit enveloping a rich balsamic core of sweet spices, cocoa, liquorice and mild herb scents. Impressively strong in the mouth, a delicate acidity and good balance. Soft, tamed, round tannins.

Name: Las Mulas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep red color. Red fruit aroma with spicy notes. Elegant, rounded tannins on the palate. Long, consistent finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Full bodied, with deep purple colour, coupled with plum and mocha aromas.

Name: Estates South Ridge Syrah
Wine Description: Varietal aromas of black tea and blueberry are lifted by barrel aging on the lees in a blend of American and French oak barrels. Smoky notes and vanilla are evident in this lean structured and spicy vintage of Syrah. Black tea and blueberry aromas with a spicy finish.
